1.5.name: wordpress/ezwebplayer-wordpress-lite-video-plugin
1.5.description:
EZWebPlayer WordPress Lite Video Plugin

As a content owner on WordPress, you have the benefit of a robust website video player that is rich in professional features and integrates into your blog. The Pro Video Plugin accommodates;

  • .flv video
  • .f4v video
  • .mp4 (h.264 codec) video
  • .mov video
  • Youtube Videos

The web video plugin allows you to post your videos, report on views, track which videos has been posted and where, and has a simple toolbar plugin that allows you to add videos quickly. Video content owners have the power to quickly create a new entry by posting standalone videos. Alternately, existing blog entries can be refreshed by the addition of one or more relevant videos with the ease of a few clicks. Overall, this web video plugin for WordPress allows content owners increased flexibility and control to integrate Flash video onto their blog pages.

A Pro Plugin is available and pro
